#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	//freopen("cook.txt","r",stdin);
	long long int t,n,i,ar[1000],j;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%lld",(ar+i));
		sort(ar,ar+n);
		j=n-1;
		i=0;
		while(i<j)
		{
			printf("%lld ",ar[j]);
			--j;
			if(i<=j)
			{
				printf("%lld ",ar[i]);
				++i;
			}
		}
		if(n%2)
		printf("%lld ",ar[i]);
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
